text: Julie Halard-Decugis was the defending champion but did not compete this year, as she retired from professional tennis at the end of the 2000 season. First- seeded Monica Seles won the title by defeating second-seeded Tamarine Tanasugarn 6–3, 6–2 in the final. ==Seeds== The top two seeds receive a bye into the second round. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ===Bottom Half=== ==References== * ITF tournament profile Category:2001 Japan Open Tennis Championships
title: 2001 AIG Japan Open Tennis Championships – Women's Singles
